title: Firefox release notes - What's new and known issues
summary: Links to Firefox release notes for Desktop, Android and iOS.
html:
For a summary of new features, fixes and known issues in the latest versions of Firefox, see:

  • Firefox release notes
  • Firefox for Android release notes
  • Firefox for iOS release notes

See also:

  • Where to find release notes for Firefox for Enterprise
text: For a summary of new features, fixes and known issues in the latest versions of Firefox, see: Firefox release notes Firefox for Android release notes Firefox for iOS release notes See also: Where to find release notes for Firefox for Enterprise
